A '''cherry grove''' is a [[mountain]] slope and plateau biome similar to [[meadow]]s, filled with [[cherry trees]].

== Description ==
The cherry grove has the same shape as a meadow, differing only by vegetation. Just like in meadows, [[emerald ore]] can be found here, especially at higher altitudes, and both [[Coal Ore|coal]] and [[iron ore]] are commonly found here. [[Infested block]]s also naturally generate in cherry groves. [[Village]]s cannot generate here, but [[pillager outpost]]s can. {{IN|Java}}, unlike most Overworld biomes, [[sugar cane]]s and [[pumpkin]] patches cannot generate here. This biome usually generates in the lower sides of some mountains but can also generate standalone in plateaus, mainly next to [[plains]] or [[sunflower plains]] and separated from [[meadow]]s or [[flower forest]]s by [[river]]s.

Cherry groves are grasslands with [[grass]], [[tall grass]], and [[pink petals]]. The main environmental feature of the cherry grove are cherry [[tree]]s identified by their pink leaves. Their leaves drop petal [[particles]]. [[Bee nest]]s with [[bee]]s generate somewhat commonly on the sides of cherry trees. The cherry trees can generate densely enough to create a cover of leaves (as upon [[map]]s).

While using [[bone meal]] on [[grass block]]s in this biome, pink petals generate on the ground in place of small flowers.{{Only|Java|short=y}}<ref>{{bug|MCPE-168074||Using Bone meal in Cherry Grove does not grow Pink Petals}}</ref>
